title: Apartment for Rent in the heart of Hollywood.
posting_body: ['Apartment for Rent in the heart of Hollywood.', 'Close to I-95 and A1A. This unit features an updated kitchen, tile floors, and plenty of windows for natural light.', 'Pets require a $250 refundable deposit per pet.', 'For consideration: Minimum credit score is 630, background check, credit report, last three bank statements, and paystubs.', 'Property is being prepared for rental, only accessible for showing with 24-hour notice period', 'FOR   AVAILABILITY  AND LANDLORD REQUIEMENTS   PLEASE   TEXT  YOUR  EMAIL  ALONG  WITH  A     SCREENSHOT  OF  THIS  POST.', 'TEXT:', 'show contact info', 'THANK YOU', 'David E Miller', 'Lic.', 'Real Estate Broker']
